name: YourPay Capital Group Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of a mobile banking platform intended to empower and transform the financial lives of customers. The company's platform helps to provide savings accounts, productive loans, consumer loans, low-interest rates and prepaid cards with no fees, enabling users to easily manage their money through their mobile.
